alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:35PM EDT until April 03 at 5:36AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford to Williams and White River at Hazleton to Petersburg. .While flooding continues along much of the White River and East fork of the White River, levels have crested and are steadily beginning to fall. More precipitation is in the forecast and this will result in prolonged flooding including a secondary rise in levels bringing some locations back above flood stage by early to mid next week. Those with interests along area waterways should monitor forecasts for the latest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Rivervale. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, A few local county roads begin to flood and are impassable. These include Buddha Road south of the gage and Lawrenceport Road. All local roads across the East Fork White River are threatened by high water, and some are closed. Flooding of agricultural lands in Lawrence County is in progress. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Saturday was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 6.6 feet Tuesday, April 11. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
